akn:content.akn:p: § 404. Reports of investigations Whenever an investigation shall be made by the Commission it shall be its duty to make a report in writing in respect thereto, which shall state the conclusions of the Commission, together with its decision, order, or requirement in the premises; and in case damages are awarded such report shall include the findings of fact on which the award is made. (June 19, 1934, ch. 652, title IV, § 404, 48 Stat. 1094.)
